extensionDescription.message: This add-on adds an item to assist translation to the context menu.

notificationTextNotSet.message: It is not working properly because there is a deficiency in the setting. Please make settings on this add-on's details page.

optionpageIfSetEn.message: If set to "en - English", texts and websites will be translated into English.

optionpageWhenSetWH.message: When set width:800 and height:720, a size of new window is 800x720. This setting is reflected only when checked.
